Text: #G02# As a UI designer, I want to redesign the Resources page, so that it matches the new Broker design styles.
#G02# As a UI designer, I want to report to the Agencies about user testing, so that they are aware of their contributions to making Broker a better UX.
Action: Report To The Agencies About User Testing

Text: #G02# As a UI designer, I want to move on to round 2 of DABS or FABS landing page edits, so that I can get approvals from leadership.
Action: Round 2 Of Dabs Landing Page Edits

Text: #G02# As a UI designer, I want to move on to round 2 of Homepage edits, so that I can get approvals from leadership.
#G02# As a UI designer, I want to move on to round 3 of the Help page edits, so that I can get approvals from leadership.
Action: Round 3 Of The Help Page Edits

Text: #G02# As a Developer, I want to add the updates on a FABS submission to be modified when the publishStatus changes, so that I know when the status of the submission has changed.
Action: Add The Updates On A Fabs Submission To Modified

Text: #G02# As a Broker user, I want to Upload and Validate the error message to have accurate text.
#G02# As a Website user, I want to access published FABS files, so that I can see the new files as they come in.
#G02# As an owner, I want to be sure that USAspending only send grant records to my system.
#G02# As a Developer, I want to update the Broker validation rule table to account for the rule updates in DB-2213.
Action: Update The Broker Validation Rule Table

Text: #G02# As a Developer, I want to add the GTAS window data to the database, so that I can ensure the site is locked down during the GTAS submission period.
Action: Add The Gtas Window Data To The Database

Text: #G02# As a user, I want to access the raw agency published files from FABS via USAspending.
#G02# As an Agency user, I want to be able to include a large number of flexfields without performance impact.
Action: Include A Large Number Of Flexfields Without Performance Impact

Text: #G02# As a Broker user, I want  to help create content mockups, so that I can submit my data efficiently.
#G02# As a UI designer, I want to track the issues that come up in Tech Thursday, so that I know what to test and what want s to be fixed.
Action: Track The Issues Thursday Come Up In Tech

Text: #G02# As an Owner, I want to create a user testing summary from the UI SME, so that I can know what UI improvements we will follow through on.
Action: Create A User Testing Summary From The Ui Sme

Text: #G02# As a UI designer, I want to begin user testing, so that I can validate stakeholder UI improvement requests.
#G02# As a UI designer, I want to schedule user testing, so that I can give the testers advanced notice to ensure buy-in.
#G02# As an Owner, I want to design a schedule from the UI SME, so that I know the potential timeline of the UI improvements wanted.
Action: Design A Schedule From The Ui Sme

Text: #G02# As an Owner, I want to design an audit from the UI SME, so that I know the potential scope of the UI improvements want ed.
Action: Design An Audit From The Ui Sme

Text: #G02# As a Developer, I want to prevent users from double publishing FABS submissions after refreshing, so that there are no duplicates.
Action: Prevent Users From Publishing Double After Refreshing

Text: #G02# As an data user, I want to receive updates to FABS records.
#G02# As a Developer , I want to update the FABS sample file to remove FundingAgencyCode after FABS is updated to no longer require the header.
#G02# As an agency user, I want to ensure that deleted FSRS records are not included in submissions.
#G02# As a website user, I want to see updated financial assistance data daily.
#G02# As a Developer , I want to ensure that attempts to correct or delete non-existent records don't create new published data.
#G02# As an Owner, I want to reset the environment to only take Staging MAX permissions, so that I can ensure that the FABS testers no longer have access.
#G02# As a user, I want to have accurate and complete data related to PPoPCode and PPoPCongressionalDistrict.
#G02# As a Developer , I want to clarify to users what exactly is triggering the CFDA error code in each case.
#G02# As a broker team member, I want to make some updates to the SQL codes for clarity.
Action: Make To The Sql Codes For Clarity

Text: #G02# As an agency user, I want to have all derived data elements derived properly.
#G02# As a data user, I want to see the office names derived from office codes, so that I can have appropriate context for understanding them.
Action: See The Office Names From Office Codes

Text: #G02# As a broker team member, I want to ensure the Broker resources, validations, and P&P pages are updated appropriately for the launch of FABS and DAIMS v1.1.
#G02# As a broker team member, I want to derive FundingAgencyCode, so that the data quality and completeness improves.
#G02# As an agency user, I want to use the schema v1.1 headers in my FABS file.
Action: Use The Schema V1.1 Headers In Fabs File

Text: #G02# As a agency user, I want to map the FederalActionObligation properly to the Atom Feed.
Action: Map The Federalactionobligation To The Atom Feed

Text: #G02# As a Broker user, I want to have PPoPZIP+4 work the same as the Legal Entity ZIP validations.
#G02# As a FABS user, I want to link the SAMPLE FILE on the "What you want  to submit" dialog to point to the correct file, so that I have an accurate reference for my agency submissions.
Action: Link The Sample File On The Want

Text: #G02# As a Developer , I want to determine how agencies will generate and validate D Files from FABS and FPDS data.
#G02# As a user, I want to generate and validate D Files from FABS and FPDS data.
Action: Generate D Files From Fabs Fpds Data
Validate D Files From Fabs Fpds Data

Text: #G02# As an Agency user, I want to receive a more helpful file-level error when I upload a file with the wrong extension.
Action: Receive A More Helpful File Level Error
Upload A File With The Wrong Extension

Text: #G02# As a tester, I want to have access to test features in environments other than Staging, so that I can test any nonProd feature in any environment.
Action: Have Access To Test Features In Other Environments Staging

Text: #G02# As a FABS user, I want to submission errors to accurately represent FABS errors, so that I know why my submission didn't work.
#G02# As an Agency user, I want to accurately see who created a submission, so that I'm not confused about who last updated a submission.
#G02# As an Agency user, I want to better understand my file-level errors.
#G02# As a Developer , I want to provide FABS groups that function under the FREC paradigm.
Action: Provide Fabs Groups Function Under The Frec Paradigm

Text: #G02# As a tester, I want to ensure that FABS is deriving fields properly through a robust test file plus a follow up check.
#G02# As a Broker user, I want to submit records for individual recipients without receiving a DUNS error.
Action: Submit Records For Individual Recipients Receiving A Duns Error

Text: #G02# As a Developer, I want to prevent duplicate transactions from being published and deal with the time gap between validation and the publishing decision.
Action: Deal With The Gap Between The Publishing Decision
Deal With The Time Gap Between Validation

Text: #G02# As a FABS user, I want to submit a citywide as a PPoPZIP and pass validations.
Action: Submit A Citywide As A Ppopzip

Text: #G02# As a Broker user, I want to have updated error codes that accurately reflect the logic and provide enough information, so that I can fix my submission.
Action: Have Updated Error Codes Accurately Reflect The Logic

Text: #G02# As an agency user, I want to leave off the last 4 digits of the ZIP without an error, so that I can complete my submissions.
Action: Leave Off The Last Digits Of The Zip Without An Error

Text: #G02# As a FABS user, I want to make sure the historical data includes all necessary columns, so that the information in the database is correct.
#G02# As a data user, I want to access two additional fields from the FPDS data pull.
Action: Access Additional Fields From The Fpds Data Pull

Text: #G02# As a FABS user, I want to download the uploaded FABS file, so that I can get the uploaded file.
#G02# As a Developer I want to quickly access Broker application data, so that I can investigate issues.
#G02# As a FABS user, I want to have read-only access to DABS, so that I can view DABS pages without wanting two sets of permissions.
#G02# As a FABS user, I want to have my validations run in a reasonable amount of time.
#G02# As a FABS user, I want to see correct status labels on the Submission Dashboard, so that I can quickly see my submission history.
Action: See Correct Status Labels On The Submission Dashboard

Text: #G02# As an agency user, I want to submit my data elements surrounded by quotation marks, so that Excel won't strip off leading and trailing zeroes.
#G05# As a Data Publishing User, I want to be able to edit a dataset I have published, So that I can correct or enhance existing data.
#G05# As a Data Publishing User, I want to be able to edit the model of data I have already imported, So that I can fix bugs or make enhancements in the API built for my data.
#G05# As a Data Publishing User, I want to be able to delete a dataset I have published, So that I can remove unwanted data from OpenSpending.
#G05# As a Platform Administrator, I want to be able to Hide any dataset already added as Public, So that I can maintain Public/Hidden status for other users.
#G05# As a Platform Administrator, I want to have a view on all datasets published by all users, So that I can perform management actions on any dataset.
Action: Have A View On All Datasets All Users

Text: #G05# As a Platform Administrator, I want to be able to delete any dataset published, So that I can deal with takedown requests, or clean up test datasets.
#G05# As a Data Publishing User, I want to be able to edit the data source of data I have already imported, So that I can fix bugs or make enhancements in the API built for my data.
Action: Edit The Data Source Of Data

Text: #G05# As a Data Publishing User, I want to have the Packager support Constants, So that I can model dimensions that may not exist in the source file.
#G05# As a Data Publishing User, I want to be able to import data in Excel, So that I do not have to convert data formats in order to use the data packager.
#G05# As a Data Publishing User, I want to know what my data needs to be able to be visualised on a map, So that I can visualise it on a map.
#G05# As a Data Publishing User, I want to be able to import data in JSON, So that I do not have to convert data formats in order to use the data packager.
#G05# As a Data Publishing User, I want to be able to import data from a Google Spreadsheet, So that I do not have to convert data formats in order to use the data packager.
Action: Import Data From A Google Spreadsheet

Text: #G05# As a Data Publishing User, I want to be able to import data from Fiscal Data Package descriptor file, So that I do not have to convert data formats in order to use the data packager.
#G05# As a Data Publishing User, I want to be able to provide the Platform Administrator with additional GeoJSON sources, So that I can improve the map-based visualisations of my data.
Action: Provide The Platform Administrator With Additional Geojson Sources

Text: #G05# As a Data Consuming User, I want to be able to filter, sort and aggregate data by multiple dimensions and measures, So that I can get more granular views on the data.
Action: Aggregate Filter Data By Multiple Dimensions

Text: #G05# As a Data Consuming User, I want to be able to download a CSV of the data that is used in any visualisation I am viewing, So that I can use the data in other tools.
Action: Download A Csv Of The Data Used In Any Visualisation

Text: #G05# As a Data Consuming User, I want to be able to change the display of all monetary measures across a set of currencies, So that I can understand localised amounts in non-localised figures.
Action: Change The Display Of All Monetary Measures Across A Set Of Currencies

Text: #G05# As a Data Consuming User, I want to see textual descriptions that accompany embedded visualisations, So that I can more easily understand what I am viewing.
Action: See Textual Descriptions That Embedded Visualisations

Text: #G05# As a Data Consuming User, I want to be able to share a view state as a URL to social networks, So that I can share data that I have found with others.
Action: Share A View State As A Url To Social Networks

Text: #G05# As a Data Consuming User, I want to be able to download an image ofa particular view state, So that I can use it offline.

#G05# As a Data Consuming User, I want to be able to share an image of a particular view state to the social networks that support this, So that I can provide richer context in those communication channels for data I am sharing.
Action: Share An Image Of A Particular View State To The Social Networks Support This

Text: #G05# As a Data Consuming User, I want to be able to have stepped zoom on map visualisations, So that I can have better control over the navigation experience inside a map view.
#G05# As a Data Consuming User, I want to have consistent use of colour on map visualisations, So that I can better understand the visual logic of the map view.
Action: Have Consistent Use Of Colour On Map Visualisations

Text: #G05# As a Developer, I want to be able to customise the Brand Name and Icon, and Primary Color of all frontend Javascript apps, So that I can customise the branding for my own needs.
#G05# As an API User, I want to be able to understand if a user is a Publisher, So that I can offer functionality based on Dataset Publisher privileges.
#G05# As an API User, I want to be able to understand if a user is an Administrator, So that I can offer functionality based on Platform Administration privileges.
#G05# As an API User, I want to be able to get bordering regions|cities when I query a region|city, So that I can provider wider visual context for mapping visualisations.
#G05# As an API User, I want to be able to dynamically request polygons based on the query made, So that I can provide maps that match the query.
#G05# As an API User, I want to have a flexible API using HASC codes for countries, regions and cities, So that I can visualise budget data on maps.
Action: Have A Flexible Api Using Codes For City
Have A Flexible Api Using Hasc Codes For Countries
Have A Flexible Api Using Codes For Region

Text: #G05# As an API User, I want to be able to get a CSV output of any cube-based query, So that I can use work with tools that read CSV.
Action: Get A Csv Output Of Any Cube, Based Query

Text: #G05# As an API User, I want to be able to get a set of monetary measures transferred to different currencies, So that I can use this in scenarios that might enable comparison by normalisation.
Action: Get A Set Of Monetary Measures To Different Currencies

Text: #G05# As an API User, I want to be able to use metadata to get results from multiple datasets, So that I can build user experiences based on more than one dataset more easily.
#G05# As an API User, I want to be able to use data to get results from multiple datasets, So that I can build user experiences based on more than one dataset more easily.
#G05# As an API User, I want to be able to normalise measures by population, So that I work with datasets in reference to their contextual constraints.
#G05# As an API User, I want to be able to normalise measures by geographical area, So that I work with datasets in reference to their contextual constraints.
#G05# As an API User, I want to be able to normalise measures by GDP, so I work with datasets in reference to their contextual constraints.
#G05# As an API User, I want to be able to normalise measures by GINI and related socioeconomic indexes, So that I work with datasets in reference to their contextual constraints.
#G05# As an API User, I want to be able to get a relative percentage of a measure to the total of the dataset it comes from, So that I can build alternative displays of the data.
Action: Get A Relative Percentage Of A Measure To The Total Of The Dataset

Text: #G05# As an API User, I want to be able to persistently store visualisation state in the database, So that such can be shared more easily and contribute to a visualisation gallery.
Action: Store Visualisation State In The Database

Text: #G05# As a Data Publishing User, I want to have my dataset update automatically as the source file/files changes, So that OpenSpending always shows current data.
Action: Have Dataset As The Source File

Text: #G05# As an OpenSpending Community Member, I want to have a blog that highlights any and all projects in the open fiscal space, So that I can relate to openspending.org as the central hub of fiscal openness.
Action: Have All Project In The Fiscal, Open Space

Text: #G05# As a User, I want to be able to set my own username, So that my data is more easily discoverable.
#G05# As a Data Publishing User, I want to be able to add a dataset in a Hidden state, So that I can work on a dataset before having it discoverable via OpenSpending user interfaces.
Action: Add A Dataset In A Hidden State

Text: #G05# As a Data Publishing User, I want to have a view on all the datasets I have published, So that I can perform management actions on my own datasets.
Action: Have A View On The Datasets

Text: #G05# As a Data Publishing User, I want to have a functioning Python Client, So that I can add data to the datastore in bulk from the command line or my own programs.
#G05# As an OpenSpending Community Member, I want to have an app where I can find examples of use of fiscal data visualisations, So that I can find guidance in creating my own with Open Spending.
Action: Find Examples Of Use Of Fiscal Data Visualisations

Text: #G05# As a Data Publishing User, I want to know if my CSV file is valid, So that I can fix possible data issues before publishing it on Open Spending.
#G05# As a Data Consuming User, I want to be able to search any dataset published and publicly accessible by their title and metadata, So that I can find the datasets I'm interested in.

#G05# As a Data Consuming User, I want to visualize by default in treemap, bubble tree, map and pivot table the most recent year when my dataset contain multiple years, So that I'm not confused with the amounts.
Action: Recent, Year Visualize By Default In Treemap Dataset When Contain Multiple Years

Text: #G05# As an API user, I want to be able to change the colors of the embedded visualisations in my own platform, So that I can customize the visualisations.
Action: Change The Colors Of The Embedded Visualisations In Own Platform

Text: #G05# As an API user, I want to be able to change some of the styling of the embedded Viewer in my own platform, So that I can brand it to my own organisation's color scheme.
Action: Change Some Of The Styling Of The Embedded Viewer In Own Platform

Text: #G05# As a Platform administrator, I want to be able to translate the data types hierarchies of the Viewer while in embed mode, So that my users can understand the interface in their native language.
Action: Translate The Data Types Hierarchies Of The Viewer In Embed Mode
